        Regional agriculture statistics
          Agri-environmental indicators
          • Manure storage facilities by NUTS 3 regions
          Structure of agricultural holdings
            Structure of agricultural holdings 2010
              Key farm variables
              • Key farm variables: area, livestock (LSU), labour force and standard output (SO) by agricultural size of farm (UAA), legal status of holding and NUTS 2 regions
              • Key variables: area, livestock (LSU), labour force and standard output (SO) by economic size of farm (SO in Euro), legal status of holding and NUTS 2 regions
              • Key variables: area, livestock (LSU), labour force and standard output (SO) by type of farming (2-digit) and NUTS 2 regions
              Farm land use - Permanent crops, other farmland, irrigation
              • Land use: number of farms and areas of different crops by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and NUTS 2 regions
              • Land use: number of farms and areas of different crops by economic size of farm (SO in Euro) and NUTS 2 regions
              • Permanent crops: number of farms and areas by size of permanent crop area and NUTS 2 regions
              • Irrigation: number of farms, areas and equipment by size of irrigated area and NUTS 2 regions
              Overview - Farm livestock
              • Livestock: number of farms and heads of animals of different types by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and NUTS 2 regions
              • Livestock: number of farms and heads of animals by livestock units (LSU) of farm and NUTS 2 regions
              • Livestock: number of farms and heads of animals by economic size of farm (SO in Euro) and NUTS 2 regions
              Farm labour force and management
              • Labour force: number of persons and farm work (AWU) by sex of workers and NUTS 2 regions
              • Organic farming: number of farms, areas with different crops and heads of different types of animals by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and NUTS 2 regions
              • Type of tenure: number of farms and areas by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and NUTS 2 regions
              • Type of tenure: number of farms and areas by economic size of farm (SO in Euro) and NUTS 2 regions
            Structure of agricultural holdings: historical data (1990-2007)
              Overview of agricultural holdings
              • Key variables by legal status of holding, size of farm (UAA) and NUTS 2 regions
              • Key variables by type of farming (2-digit) and NUTS 2 regions
              Land Use
              • Farmland: number of farms and areas by size of farm (UAA) and NUTS 2 regions
              • Farmland: number of farms and areas by economic size of farm (ESU) and NUTS 2 regions
              • Permanent crops: number of farms and areas by size of farm (UAA), size of permanent crop area and NUTS 2 regions
              • Irrigation: number of farms, areas and equipment by size of farm (UAA) and region
              Livestock
              • Livestock: number of farms and heads by size of farm (UAA) and NUTS 2 regions
              • Livestock: number of farms and heads by livestock units (LSU) of farm and NUTS 2 regions
              • Livestock: number of farms and heads by economic size of farm (ESU) and NUTS 2 regions

              • Type of tenure: number of farms and areas by size of farm (UAA) and NUTS 2 regions
              • Labour force: number of persons and farm work (AWU) by sex of worker, category of worker, legal status of holding, size of farm (UAA) and NUTS 2 regions
              • Labour force: number of persons and farm work (AWU) by sex of worker, category of worker, legal status of holding, economic size of farm (ESU) and NUTS 2 regions
              Structure of agricultural holdings by region, main indicators
              • Structure of agricultural holdings by NUTS 3 regions - main indicators

      Labour market
        Employment and unemployment (Labour Force Survey)

            • Population, activity and inactivity - annual averages
            • Population, activity and inactivity - quarterly data
            • Duration of working life - annual data
            • Average exit age from the labour force - annual data

            • Employment (main characteristics and rates) - quarterly data
            • Employment growth and activity branches - annual averages
            • Employment growth and activity branches - quarterly data

            • Unemployment rate by sex and age groups - quarterly average, %

            • Nights spent at tourist accommodation establishments by degree of urbanisation (from 2012 onwards)
            • Nights spent at tourist accommodation establishments by degree of urbanisation and by NUTS 2 regions (from 2012 onwards)
            • Nights spent at tourist accommodation establishments by coastal and non-coastal area (from 2012 onwards)
            • Nights spent at tourist accommodation establishments by coastal and non-coastal area and by NUTS 2 regions (from 2012 onwards)
            • Nights spent at hotels and similar accommodation (NACE Rev. 2, I, 55.1) by size class (from 2012 onwards)
            Arrivals of residents and non-residents
            • Arrivals at tourist accommodation establishments
            • Arrivals at tourist accommodation establishments by NUTS 2 regions
            • Arrivals at tourist accommodation establishments by country/world region of residence of the tourist
            Occupancy rates for hotels and similar accommodation
            • Net occupancy rate of bed-places and bedrooms in hotels and similar accommodation (NACE Rev. 2, I, 55.1) by size class (from 2012 onward)
            • Net occupancy rate of bed-places and bedrooms in hotels and similar accommodation (NACE Rev. 2, I, 55.1) by NUTS 2 regions (from 2012 onwards)
          Capacity of tourist accommodation establishments
          • Number of establishments, bedrooms and bed-places
          • Number of establishments, bedrooms and bed-places by NUTS 2 regions
          • Number of establishments, bedrooms and bed-places by degree of urbanisation (from 2012 onwards)
          • Number of establishments, bedrooms and bed-places by degree of urbanisation and by NUTS 2 regions (from 2012 onwards)
          • Number of establishments, bedrooms and bed-places by coastal and non-coastal area (from 2012 onwards)
          • Number of establishments, bedrooms and bed-places by coastal and non-coastal area and by NUTS 2 regions (from 2012 onwards)
          • Hotels and similar accommodation (NACE Rev.2, I, 55.1) by size class: number of establishments, bedrooms and bed-places (from 2012 onwards)
          • Number of establishments, bedrooms and bed-places by NUTS 3 regions (1990-2011)
          Employment in the accommodation sector (Source: Labour Force Survey)
            NACE Rev. 1.1 - data until 2007
            • Employed persons by full-time/part-time activity (NACE Rev. 1.1)
            • Employed persons by age groups (NACE Rev. 1.1)
            • Employed persons by level of education attained (NACE Rev. 1.1)
            • Permanency of job (permanent or temporary) (NACE Rev. 1.1)
            • Average seniority of work with the same employer (NACE Rev. 1.1)
            • Employed persons and employees by sex and full-time/part-time activity (NACE Rev. 1.1)
            NACE Rev. 2 - data from 2008 onwards
            • Employed persons by full-time/part-time activity (NACE Rev. 2)
            • Employed persons by age groups (NACE Rev. 2)
            • Employed persons by level of education attained (NACE Rev. 2)
            • Permanency of job (permanent or temporary) (NACE Rev. 2)
            • Average seniority of work with the same employer (NACE Rev. 2)
            • Employed persons and employees by sex and full-time/part-time activity (NACE Rev. 2)

    Agriculture, forestry and fisheries
      Agriculture
        Farm structure
          Farm structure 2010
            Key farm variables
            • Key farm variables: area, livestock (LSU), labour force and standard output (SO) by agricultural size of farm (UAA), legal status of holding and NUTS 2 regions
            • Key variables: area, livestock (LSU), labour force and standard output (SO) by economic size of farm (SO in Euro), legal status of holding and NUTS 2 regions
            • Key variables: area, livestock (LSU), labour force and standard output (SO) by type of farming (2-digit) and agricultural size of farm (UAA)
            • Key farm variables: area, livestock (LSU), labour force and standard output (SO) by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and age of manager
            • Key variables: area, livestock (LSU), labour force and standard output (SO) by type of farming (2-digit) and economic size of farm (SO in Euro)
            • Key variables: area, livestock (LSU), labour force and standard output (SO) by type of farming (2-digit) and NUTS 2 regions
            Overview - Farm land use
            • Land use: number of farms and areas of different crops by type of farming (2-digit)
            • Land use: number of farms and areas of different crops by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and NUTS 2 regions
            • Land use: number of farms and areas of different crops by economic size of farm (SO in Euro) and NUTS 2 regions
            Overview - Farm livestock
            • Livestock: number of farms and heads of animals by type of farming (2-digit)
            • Livestock: number of farms and heads of animals of different types by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and NUTS 2 regions
            • Livestock: number of farms and heads of animals by livestock units (LSU) of farm and NUTS 2 regions
            • Livestock: number of farms and heads of animals by economic size of farm (SO in Euro) and NUTS 2 regions
            Overview - Farm labour force
            • Labour force: number of persons and farm work (AWU) by type of farming (2-digit) and economic size of farm (SO in Euro)
            • Labour force: number of persons and farm work (AWU) by agricultural size of farm (UAA)
            • Labour force: number of persons and farm work (AWU) by sex of workers and NUTS 2 regions
            Farm land use - Arable land
            • Arable crops: number of farms and areas of different arable crops by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and size of arable area
            • Arable crops: number of farms and areas of different arable crops by economic size of farm (SO in Euro) and size of arable area
            • Cereals: number of farms and areas by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and size of cereal area
            • Common wheat: number of farms and areas by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and size of common wheat area
            • Barley: number of farms and areas by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and size of barley area
            • Grain maize: number of farms and areas by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and size of grain maize area
            • Potatoes: number of farms and area by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and size of potato area
            • Industrial crops: number of farms and areas by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and size of industrial crop area
            • Sugar beet: number of farms and areas by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and size of sugar beet area
            • Vegetables, melons, strawberries: number of farms and areas by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and size of vegetable, melon and strawberry outdoor area
            • Flowers and ornamental plants: number of farms and areas by agricultural size of farm (UAA)
            Farm land use - Permanent crops, other farmland, irrigation
            • Permanent crops: number of farms and areas by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and size of permanent crop area
            • Permanent crops: number of farms and areas by economic size of farm (SO in Euro) and size of permanent crop area
            • Permanent crops: number of farms and areas by size of permanent crop area and NUTS 2 regions
            • Fruit and berry plantations: number of farms and areas by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and size of fruit and berry plantation area
            • Olive plantations: number of farms and areas by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and size of olive plantation area
            • Vineyards: number of farms and areas by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and size of vineyard area
            • Crops under glass: number of farms and areas by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and size of crops under glass area
            • Permanent grassland: number of farms and areas by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and size of permanent grassland area
            • Irrigation: number of farms, areas and equipment by size of irrigated area and NUTS 2 regions
            • Other land: number of farms and areas by agricultural size of farm (UAA)
            • Mushrooms, energy crops, GMO: number of farms and areas by size of farm (UAA)
            Farm livestock and fodder crops
            • Cattle: number of farms and heads and fodder crops by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and size of cattle herd
            • Cattle: number of farms and heads and fodder crops by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and livestock units (LSU) of farm
            • Dairy cows: number of farms and heads and fodder crops by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and size of dairy herd
            • Other cows: number of farms and heads and fodder crops by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and size of other cow herd
            • Fodder crops: number of farms and areas by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and size of fodder crops area
            • Goats: number of farms and heads and fodder crops by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and size of goat herd
            • Sheep: number of farms and heads and fodder crops by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and size of sheep flock
            • Poultry: number of farms and heads by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and size of broiler flock
            • Poultry: number of farms and heads by economic size of farm (SO in Euro) and size of broiler flock
            • Laying hens: number of farms and heads of poultry by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and size of laying hen flock
            • Laying hens: number of farms and heads by economic size of farm (SO in Euro) and size of laying hen flock
            • Pigs: number of farms and heads by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and size of pig herd
            • Pigs: number of farms and heads by economic size of farm (SO in Euro) and size of pig herd
            • Pigs-sows: number of farms and heads by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and size of breeding sow herd
            • Pigs-sows: number of farms and heads by economic size of farm (SO in Euro) and size of breeding sow herd
            Farm labour force
            • Labour force categories: number of persons and farm work (AWU) by sex of worker, legal satus of holding and agricultural size of farm (UAA)
            • Labour force categories: number of persons and farm work (AWU) by legal status of holding and economic size of farm (SO in Euro)
            • Labour force categories: number of persons and farm work (AWU) in the holding by working time (% AWU) and agricultural size of farm (UAA)
            Other gainful activities and support for rural development
            • Other gainful activities (OGA) of the farm of sole holder: number of farms, agricultural area, standard output (SO) and livestock (LSU) by agricultural size of farm (UAA)
            • Other gainful activities (OGA) of the farm of sole holder: number of farms, agricultural area, standard output (SO) and livestock (LSU) by economic size of farm (SO in Euro)
            • Other gainful activities (OGA) of the farm of sole holder: number of farms, agricultural area, standard output (SO) and livestock (LSU) by type of farming (1-digit)
            • Other gainful activities (OGA) of the farm of sole holder: number of farms, agricultural area, standard output (SO) and livestock (LSU) by age of holder
            • Other gainful activities directly related to the holding: number of farms, agricultural area, standard output (SO) and livestock (LSU) by age and sex of holder
            • Support for rural development: number of farms, agricultural area, standard output (SO) and livestock (LSU) by legal status of holding and agricultural size of farm (UAA)
            • Support for rural development: number of farms, agricultural area, standard output (SO) and livestock (LSU) by legal status and economic size of farm (SO in Euro)
            • Support for rural development: number of farms, agricultural area, standard output (SO) and livestock (LSU) by legal status and type of farming (1-digit)
            • Support for rural development: number of farms, agricultural area, standard output (SO) and livestock (LSU) by age and sex of holder
            Farm management and practises
            • Holder-manager relationship: area, livestock, labour force and standard output (SO) by agricultural size of farm (UAA)
            • Farm equipment: agricultural area and number of farms with different type of equipment by agricultural size of farm (UAA)
            • Organic farming: number of farms, areas with different crops and heads of different types of animals by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and NUTS 2 regions
            • Type of tenure: number of farms and areas by agricultural size of farm (UAA) and NUTS 2 regions
            • Type of tenure: number of farms and areas by economic size of farm (SO in Euro) and NUTS 2 regions
            • Agricultural training of farm managers: number of farms, agricultural area, labour force and standard output (SO) by age and sex of the manager
            • Agricultural training of farm managers: number of farms, agricultural area, labour force, standard output (SO) and livestock (LSU) by economic size of farm (SO in Euro)
            Survey on agricultural production methods (SAPM, 2010)
            • Tillage methods: number of farms and areas by size of arable area and NUTS 2 regions
            • Tillage methods: number of farms and areas by economic size of farm (SO in euros) and NUTS 2 regions
            • Soil conservation: number of farms and areas by size of arable area and NUTS 2 regions
            • Soil conservation: number of farms and areas by economic size of farm (SO in euros) and NUTS 2 regions
            • Landscape features: number of farms and areas by agricultural size (UAA), economic size of farm (SO in euros) and NUTS 2 regions
            • Animal grazing on the holding: number of farms and area grazed by duration, economic size of farm (SO in euros) and NUTS 2 regions
            • Common land grazing: number of farms and grazing livestock (LSU) by duration, total LSU of the holding and age of the manager
            • Common land grazing: number of farms and grazing livestock (LSU) by duration and economic size of farm (SO in euros)
            • Animal housing - cattle: number of farms and places by cattle size class and agricultural size of farm (UAA)
            • Animal housing - cattle: number of farms and places by cattle size classes, economic size of farm (SO in euros) and NUTS 2 regions
            • Animal housing - pigs: number of farms and places by pig size classes, economic size of farm (SO in euros) and NUTS 2 regions
            • Animal housing - laying hens: number of farms and places by laying hens size classes, economic size of farm (SO in euros) and NUTS 2 regions
            • Solid manure application as % of the UAA: number of holdings and UAA by economic size (SO in euros) and agriculture size (UAA) of farm
            • Solid manure application as % of the UAA: number of holdings and areas by economic size (SO in euros) and livestock units (LSU) of farm
            • Slurry application as % of the UAA: number of holdings and areas by economic size (SO in euros) and agriculture size (UAA) of farm
            • Slurry application as % of the UAA: number of holdings and areas by economic size (SO in euros) and livestock units (LSU) of farm
            • Manure exported from the holding in % of total produced: number of farms and areas by economic size (SO in euros), agriculture size (UAA) of farm and NUTS 2 regions
            • Manure exported from the holding in % of total produced: number of farms and areas by economic size (SO in euros), livestock units (LSU) of farm and NUTS 2 regions
            • Manure storage and treatment facilities: number of farms and areas by economic size (SO in euros), agriculture size (UAA) of farm and NUTS 2 regions
            • Manure storage and treatment facilities: number of farms and areas by economic size (SO in euros), livestock units (LSU) of farm and NUTS 2 regions
          • Standard output (SO) coefficients used for typology
          Farm structure: historical data (1990-2007)
            Overview of agricultural holdings
              Key farm variables
              • Key variables by legal status of holding, size of farm (UAA) and NUTS 2 regions
              • Key variables by size of farm (UAA), economic size of farm (ESU) and LFA status
              • Key variables by age of holder, size of farm (UAA) and LFA status
              • Key variables by type of farming (1-digit), economic size of farm (ESU), LFA status and region
              • Key variables by type of farming (1-digit), economic size of farm (ESU) and objective zone 2000
              • Key variables by type of farming (1-digit), economic size of farm (ESU), objective zone 1999 and region
              • Key variables by type of farming (2-digit) and size of farm (UAA)
              • Key variables by type of farming (2-digit) and economic size of farm (ESU)
              • Key variables by type of farming (2-digit) and NUTS 2 regions
              Land use summary
              • Land use: number of farms and areas by size of farm (UAA) and LFA status
              • Land use: number of farms and areas by size of farm (UAA) and objective zone 2000
              • Land use: number of farms and areas by size of farm (UAA) and objective zone 1999
              • Land use: number of farms and areas by type of farming (2-digit) and economic size of farm (ESU)
              Livestock summary
              • Livestock: number of farms and heads by size of farm (UAA) and LFA status
              • Livestock: number of farms and heads by size of farm (UAA) and objective zone 2000
              • Livestock: number of farms and heads by size of farm (UAA) and objective zone 1999
              • Livestock: number of farms, heads and LSU by type of farming (2-digit) and economic size of farm (ESU)
              Labour force summary
              • Labour force: number of persons and farm work (AWU) by size of farm (UAA) and LFA status
              • Labour force: number of persons and farm work (AWU) by size of farm (UAA) and objective zone 2000
              • Labour force: number of persons and farm work (AWU) by size of farm (UAA) and objective zone 1999
              • Labour force: number of persons and farm work (AWU) by type of farming (2-digit) and economic size of farm (ESU)
            Land Use
              Land use overview
              • Farmland: number of farms and areas by size of farm (UAA) and NUTS 2 regions
              • Farmland: number of farms and areas by economic size of farm (ESU) and NUTS 2 regions
              Arable land
              • Arable crops: number of farms and areas by size of farm (UAA) and size of arable area
              • Cereals: number of farms, areas and combine harvestors by size of farm (UAA) and size of cereal area
              • Common wheat: number of farms and area by size of farm (UAA) and size of common wheat area
              • Barley: number of farms and area by size of farm (UAA) and size of barley area
              • Grain maize: number of farms and area by size of farm (UAA) and size of grain maize area
              • Potatoes: number of farms and area by size of farm (UAA) and size of potato area
              • Sugar beet: number of farms and area by size of farm (UAA) and size of sugar beet area
              • Industrial plants: number of farms and areas by size of farm (UAA) and size of industrial plant area
              • Vegetables, melons, strawberries and greenhouses: number of farms and areas by size of farm (UAA) and size of vegetable, melon and strawberry outdoor area
              • Vegetables, melons, strawberries and greenhouses: number of farms and areas by size of farm (UAA) and size of vegetable, melon and strawberry area under glass
              • Flowers and ornamental plants: number of farms and areas by size of farm (UAA) and size of flower and ornamental plant area
              Permanent crops
              • Permanent crops: number of farms and areas by size of farm (UAA) and size of permanent crop area
              • Permanent crops: number of farms and areas by size of farm (UAA), size of permanent crop area and NUTS 2 regions
              • Fruit and berry plantations: number of farms and areas by size of farm (UAA) and size of fruit and berry plantation area
              • Olive plantations: number of farms and areas by size of farm (UAA) and size of olive plantation area
              • Vineyards: number of farms and areas by size of farm (UAA) and size of vineyard area
              Other farmland
              • Permanent grassland: number of farms and areas by size of farm (UAA) and size of permanent grassland area
              • Fallow land and set-aside land: number of farms and areas by size of farm (UAA) and size of arable area
              • Irrigation: number of farms, areas and equipment by size of farm (UAA) and region
              • Crops under glass: number of farms and areas by size of farm (UAA) and size of crops under glass area
              • Other land: number of farms and areas by size of farm (UAA) and size of wooded area
            Livestock
              Livestock overview
              • Livestock: number of farms and heads by size of farm (UAA) and NUTS 2 regions
              • Livestock: number of farms and heads by livestock units (LSU) of farm and NUTS 2 regions
              • Livestock: number of farms and heads by economic size of farm (ESU) and NUTS 2 regions
              Grazing livestock
              • Cattle: number of farms and heads by size of farm (UAA) and size of cattle herd
              • Cattle: number of farms and heads by size of farm (UAA) and livestock units (LSU) of farm
              • Dairy cows: number of farms and heads by size of farm (UAA) and size of dairy herd
              • Other cows: number of farms and heads by size of farm (UAA) and size of other cow herd
              • Sheep: number of farms and heads by size of farm (UAA) and size of sheep flock
              • Goats: number of farms and heads by size of farm (UAA) and size of goat herd
              • Fodder crops: number of farms and areas by size of farm (UAA) and size of fodder crops area
              Granivores
              • Pigs: number of farms and heads by size of farm (UAA) and size of breeding sow herd
              • Pigs: number of farms and heads by size of farm (UAA) and size of other pig herd
              • Poultry: number of farms and heads by size of farm (UAA) and size of broiler flock
              • Poultry: number of farms and heads by size of farm (UAA) and size of laying hen flock
            Special interest topics
              Labour force
              • Labour force: number of persons and farm work (AWU) by sex of worker, category of worker, legal status of holding, size of farm (UAA) and NUTS 2 regions
              • Labour force: number of persons and farm work (AWU) by sex of worker, category of worker, legal status of holding, economic size of farm (ESU) and NUTS 2 regions
              • Labour force: number of persons and farm work (AWU) by age of worker, category of worker and size of farm (UAA)
              • Labour force: number of persons and farm work (AWU) by working time (% AWU), category of worker and size of farm (UAA)
              • Family labour force: number of persons and farm work (AWU) by sex of worker, age of worker and size of farm (UAA)
              Rural development
              • Other activities on the holding: number of farms, agricultural area and economic size (ESU) by legal status of holding and size of farm (UAA)
              • Other activities on the holding: number of farms, agricultural area and economic size (ESU) by legal status of holding, type of farming (1-digit) and economic size of farm (ESU)
              • Other activities on the holding: number of farms, agricultural area and economic size (ESU) by legal status of holding and other gainful activity of sole-holder
              • Other activities on the holding: number of farms, agricultural area and economic size (ESU) by age of holder and sex of holder
              • Family labour force with other gainful activity: number of persons by size of farm (UAA)
              Management and practises
              • Holder-manager relationship: selected variables by size of farm (UAA)
              • Type of tenure: number of farms and areas by size of farm (UAA) and NUTS 2 regions
              • Agricultural training of farm managers: selected variables by economic size of farm (ESU)
              • Organic farming: selected variables by size of farm (UAA) and NUTS 2 regions
              • Farm machinery: number of farms and machines by size of farm (UAA)
          • Standard gross margin (SGM) coefficients used for typology
          • Standard output (SO) coefficients used for typology
          • Structure of agricultural holdings and labour force
            • Structure of agricultural holdings by region, main indicators
            • Structure of agricultural holdings by eurofarm region, main indicators
            • Structure of agricultural holdings by NUTS 3 regions - main indicators

          • Economic accounts for agriculture - values at current prices
          • Economic accounts for agriculture - values at n-1 prices

          • Agricultural Labour Input Statistics: indices (2005 = 100)

          • Unit values at producer prices

        Agricultural prices and price indices
          Selling prices of agricultural products (absolute prices), land prices and rents
          • Land prices and rents - annual data
          • Selling prices of crop products (absolute prices) - annual price (from 2000 onwards)
          • Selling prices of animal products (absolute prices) - annual price (from 2000 onwards)
          • Purchase prices of the means of agricultural production (absolute prices) - annual price (from 2000 onwards)
          • Selling prices of crop products (absolute prices) - annual - old codes - data from 1969 to 2005
          • Selling prices of crop products (absolute prices) - monthly - old codes - data from 1969 to 2006
          • Selling prices of animal products (absolute prices) - annual - old codes - data from 1969 to 2005
          • Selling prices of animal products (absolute prices) - monthly - old code - data from 1969 to 2006
          • Purchase prices of the means of agricultural production (absolute prices) - annual - old codes - data from 1969 to 2005
          • Purchase prices of the means of agricultural production (absolute prices) - monthly - old codes - data from 1969 to 2006
          Price indices of agricultural products
            Price indices of agricultural products (2005 = 100)
            • Price indices of the means of agricultural production, input (2005 = 100) - annual data
            • Price indices of the means of agricultural production, input (2005 = 100) - quarterly data
            • Price indices of agricultural products, output (2005 = 100) - annual data
            • Price indices of agricultural products, output (2005 = 100) - quarterly data
            Price indices of agricultural products (2000 = 100)
            • Price indices of the means of agricultural production, input (2000 = 100) - annual data
            • Price indices of the means of agricultural production, input (2000 = 100) - monthly data
            • Price indices of the means of agricultural production, input (2000 = 100) - quarterly data
            • Price indices of agricultural products, output (2000 = 100) - annual data
            • Price indices of agricultural products, output (2000 = 100) - monthly data
            • Price indices of agricultural products, output (2000 = 100) - quarterly data
            Price indices of agricultural products (1995 = 100)
            • EC index of producer prices of agricultural products (1995 = 100) - annual data
            • EC index of producer prices of agricultural products (monthly index, monthly weighting) change in quarterly averages of the monthly index
            • EC indices of purchase prices of the means of agricultural production (1995 = 100) - annual data
            • EC indices of purchase prices of the means of agricultural production (1995 = 100) - monthly data
        Agricultural production
          Crops products
            Crops products: areas and productions
            • Crops products - annual data
            • Land use - 1 000 ha - annual data

            • Cereals balance sheet - marketing year

          Poultry farming
          • Poultry - annual data

          • International annual road freight transport by country of loading and unloading, total of all reporting countries (1 000 t, Mio Tkm)

          • Imports (by country of origin) - gas - monthly data
          • Imports (by country of origin) - electricity - monthly data

          • Exports (by country of destination) - solid fuels - monthly data
          • Exports (by country of destination) - oil - monthly data
          • Exports (by country of destination) - gas - monthly data
          • Exports (by country of destination) - electricity - monthly data

          • Gas prices for domestic consumers, from 2007 onwards - bi-annual data
          • Gas prices for industrial consumers, from 2007 onwards - bi-annual data
          • Electricity prices for domestic consumers, from 2007 onwards - bi-annual data
          • Electricity prices for industrial consumers, from 2007 onwards - bi-annual data

          • Electricity prices components for industrial consumers, from 2007 onwards - annual data

      • Youth unemployment rate - % of active population in the same age group
